text: C'est mon incontournable à Laval pour le poulet portugais. J'en ai essayé d'autres mais pour l'instant, c'est le meilleur. On nous offre un choix entre la sauce douce et piquante et les 2 sont délicieuses. On en badigeonne sur le poulet à la sortie du grill de sorte qu'elle pénètre bien la viande. Je prends la douce avec une piquante à côté pour faire trempette.  Tous les accompagnements sont bons, surtout les frites, et les portions sont généreuses.  Ne partez surtout pas sans les natas! La pâte est croustillante et la garniture crémeuse avec un merveilleux goût de crème brûlée... Ils offrent aussi d'autres spécialités portugaises et une belle variété de desserts.

Originally, I was disappointed that Patisserie Lajeunesse was created in place my favorite pizza place (that hasn't been replace in my heart... years after it has been closed!!!) but that feeling left over time with the occasional visit.  Surprisingly this Patisserie offers more than baked goods, they also have grilled meats and the such.. which is pretty unusual and while I've never personally tried any of it one thing is for sure, every time I visit the grill area is pretty popular.  As for the pastries go, they have what you normally find and while I've only bought cakes, they have many things that tempt me. :)  Their cakes are great and never fail to impress when I host or bring to get togethers.  What I like best about this place is how nice and friendly the staff is with goods that honestly compared to some other pastries, are quite economical.  All in all, a great patisserie and something you try.
En plus de la pâtisserie, ils offrent une grillade qui est excellente. En autre, il y a le poulet portugais. Essayez la version épicée!

I've been here a few times most of the time I get the the family combo it's kind of pricey     for 25$ plus tax  it's a whole chicken that comes with 2 side dishes. I get their   potatoes and salad nothing special about the salad I just get it to have veggies in my meal.  I really like the patates worth getting chicken taste like a traditional Portuguese style they do it a little better then other places I tried .  I'm not much into sweets so I haven't tried the bake goods . I don't know a better place in Laval for Portuguese food.
